alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Madison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:36PM EDT until April 05 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN MADISON AND HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 1235 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tipton to near Zionsville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Cicero, Arcadia and Atlanta around 1240 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Fishers, Noblesville, Frankton, Ingalls, Lapel, Pendleton, Edgewood, River Forest, Woodlawn Heights, Country Club Heights and Anderson. This includes Interstate 69 between mile markers 204 and 221. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
